docs.title: nft-utils
docs.text: nft-utils is an nf-test plugin to provide additional functions and assertions that fall outside of the typical nf-test features. They were primarily developed by the nf-core community but should be applicable to any nf-tests.

docs.title: Start using the plugin
docs.text:
To start using the plugin please add it to your nf-test.config file:

nf-test.config
config {
    plugins {
        load "nft-utils"
    }
}

It's a good idea to specify a version which you can do using the @ symbol, however currently there are no releases:

nf-test.config
config {
    plugins {
        load "nft-utils@0.0.2"
    }
}

Have a look at the usage documentation for more information on how to start working with the plugin.

docs.title: Use a development version
docs.text:
To use the development version, please do the following steps:

  • Clone the nft-utils repository
HTTPSSSH 
git clone git@github.com:nf-core/nft-utils.git

git clone https://github.com/nf-core/nft-utils.git
  • Run the build script
./build.sh
  • Add the jar location (visible at the end of the build script output) to the nf-test.config file
nf-test.config
config {
    plugins {
        loadFromFile "full/path/to/the/plugin/jar"
    }
}
